title: HOUR 1- Jim Jackson Aug 27, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 1- Jim Jackson Aug 27, 2020
description:
Dan and company welcome NBA veteran and FS1 analyst Jim Jackson to the show as he talks about the strike within the NBA bubble as social justice protests continue to amplify in the wake of Jacob Blake's shooting.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
